item.sophisticatedbackpacks.identificati: Automatically identifies unidentified items that enter the backpack. Shift-right click to set owner. Note: identified gear will increase your spirit recovery cost. Make sure it is BEFORE any Pickup Upgrade you have!
Automatically identifies unidentified items that enter the backpack, can toggle whether it works in vaults. Shift-right click to set owner. Make sure it is BEFORE any Pickup Upgrade you have!
item.sophisticatedstorage.identification: Automatically identifies unidentified items that enter the storage. Shift-right click to set owner.
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.activator_up: Uses Treasure Keys from backpack inventory to open Treasure Doors when right-clicking them.
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.drop_upgrade: Drops items that match the filter.
Drops items that match the filter.
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.recycler_upg: Recycles recyclable items like a Vault Recycler would.
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.opener_upgra: Opens certain items like Gem Boxes, Omega Boxes, etc. automatically.
item.sophisticatedstorage.drop_upgrade.t: Drops items that match the filter.
item.sophisticatedstorage.drop_upgrade_a: Drops items that match the filter.
item.sophisticatedstorage.recycler_upgra: Recycles recyclable items like a Vault Recycler would.
item.sophisticatedstorage.diffuser_upgra: Automatically diffuses items with soul value into soul dust when they match the filter.
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.diffuser_upg: Automatically diffuses items with soul value into soul dust when they match the filter.
Automatically diffuses items with soul value into soul dust when they match the filter.
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.recycler_upg: Recycles recyclable items like a Vault Recycler would.
item.sophisticatedstorage.diffuser_upgra: Automatically diffuses items with soul value into soul dust when they match the filter. Can automatically compact to Soul Shards and send them to your Shard Pouch.
item.sophisticatedstorage.recycler_upgra: Recycles recyclable items like a Vault Recycler would.
item.sophisticatedstorage.opener_upgrade: Opens certain items like Gem Boxes, Omega Boxes, etc. automatically.
